snippet: Thomas Parenty, who runs a security consulting firm that advises multinationals on computer security in China, recently offered his views on how to keep your gadgets safe in China.
lead_paragraph: Thomas Parenty, who runs a security consulting firm that advises multinationals on computer security in China, recently offered his views on how to keep your gadgets safe in China.

headline.main: While in China, Protect Your Devices and Data
